metadata.title: CVE-2020-11984 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
Apache HTTP server 2.4.32 to 2.4.44 mod_proxy_uwsgi info disclosure andpossible RCE

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-11984` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

apache2 - 2.4.46-1ubuntu1
apache2-bin - 2.4.46-1ubuntu1
apache2-data - 2.4.46-1ubuntu1
apache2-suexec-custom - 2.4.46-1ubuntu1
apache2-suexec-pristine - 2.4.46-1ubuntu1
apache2-utils - 2.4.46-1ubuntu1
libapache2-mod-md - 2.4.46-1ubuntu1
libapache2-mod-proxy-uwsgi - 2.4.46-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: apache2 package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.4.46-1ubuntu1').
